sources.title: Beast Of Burden | Full Movie | Action Crime Adventure | Daniel Radcliffe
sources.description:
*Beast Of Burden* - Pilot Sean Haggerty (Daniel Radcliffe) is a trusted mule for a major international drug cartel, running cocaine across the U.S/Mexico border. Little does the cartel know Sean also works for the U.S. Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA). In exchange for Seanâ€™s help, the DEA agrees to pay for an operation for Danielâ€™s sick wife, Julie (Grace Gummer), if he completes his mission to help bring down the cartel. 
2018.  Stars: Daniel Radcliffe, Grace Gummer, Pablo Schreiber

metadata.Plot: Sean Haggerty only has an hour to deliver his illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a hitman, and the DEA that nothing is wrong. An hour to make sure his wife survives. And he must do it all from the cockpit of his Cessna.
metadata.Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Grace Gummer, Pablo Schreiber
